text: Charles Frank Bolden, Jr. (born August 19, 1946) was the 12th Administrator of NASA from 2009 through 2017. He is a retired United States Marine Corps Major General, and former NASA astronaut. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Administrators of NASA Category:American astronauts Category:Scientists from South Carolina Category:People from Columbia, South Carolina
title: Charles Bolden
